item.title: Ten Mistakes Writers Donâ€™t See (But Can Easily Fix When They Do)
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: So the following is a list I'll be referring to people *before* they submit anything in writing to anybody (me, agent, publisher, your mom, your boss). From email messages and front-page news in the New York Times to published books and magazine articles, the 10 ouchies listed here crop up everywhere. They're so pernicious that even respected Internet columnists are not immune. (Link courtesy of Eyebeam reBlog)
